docs.snippet: Teams had to buy and install new posts, a tricky job, after the N.F.L. approved a measure to make the uprights five feet higher, or 35 feet above the crossbar, next season....
docs.lead_paragraph: Teams had to buy and install new posts, a tricky job, after the N.F.L. approved a measure to make the uprights five feet higher, or 35 feet above the crossbar, next season.
docs.abstract: Uprights of goal posts in every NFL stadium are being extended five feet higher to comply with new NFL rule.

docs.snippet: A FIFA appeals committee on Thursday upheld the decision, which bars Suárez from nine international matches and all soccer-related activity for four months, for biting another player....
docs.lead_paragraph: A FIFA appeals committee on Thursday upheld the decision, which bars Suárez from nine international matches and all soccer-related activity for four months, for biting another player.
docs.abstract: FIFA appeals committee rejects motions filed by Luis Suarez and Uruguay’s soccer federation seeking to overturn or reduce his four-month suspension from soccer for biting another player during the World Cup.

headline.main: FIFA Rejects Suárez’s Appeal of 4-Month Ban
headline.print_headline: FIFA Rejects Suárez’s Appeal of 4-Month Ban

docs.snippet: The grumbling among the 15,000 volunteers at this World Cup started early, with a complaint here, a criticism there, and it grew as the weeks went on....
docs.lead_paragraph: The grumbling among the 15,000 volunteers at this World Cup started early, with a complaint here, a criticism there, and it grew as the weeks went on.
docs.abstract: Juliet Macur Sports of The Times column on how FIFA has treated its thousands of World Cup volunteers; they receive no housing, no paycheck and the only job training is in Portuguese; many have been griping for weeks, but not about working without a paycheck; they are upset because they did not receive tickets to any of the matches.

headline.seo: World Cup 2014: Volunteers in Brazil Find Reasons to Complain
headline.main: Many Sacrifices, but Few Perks for Event’s Volunteers
headline.print_headline: Many Sacrifices, but Few Perks for Event’s Volunteers
